alert.note: Alert for Allen; Huntington; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:11AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Allen, northeastern Huntington and north central Wells Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 410 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Markle around 430 AM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 near mile marker 3, and between mile markers 7 and 8. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 286 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
